tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE government_regulations (regulation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
regulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
regulation_description TEXT,
regulation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
incentive_available BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
start_date DATE,
end_date DATE,
regulatory_body VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE incentives (
    incentive_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incentive_title VARCHAR(255),
    incentive_description TEXT,
    incentive_type VARCHAR(50),
    incentive_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  regulation_id INT,
  incentive_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES regulations (regulation_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (incentive_id) REFERENCES incentives (incentive_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Incentives (
  incentive_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incentive_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Companies (
  company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(50),
  region VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  company_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Contacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_name VARCHAR(255),
  company_id INT,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);
